thread.title: SUSAN

author: SUSAN
title: SUSAN
text: I opted to pay extra for the video type of class. However, the video was awful with outdated pixels. It was so distracting it was difficult to hear or see what they were saying/showing. I managed to complete the course but would never recommend to pay for the video type until they upgrade them to 2017 videos. It is terribly out of date and behind the times technically!!!!
